content.title: Ganesh Shankar Vidyaarthi Shramik Puraskar Rashi Yojana
content.beneficiary: Children of workers in registered factories, commercial establishments, and shops
content.details: The Government of Uttar Pradesh emphasizes the importance of education for children of workers in registered factories, commercial establishments, and shops. Hence to encourage them, financial assistance will be provided. Recognizing and celebrating academic achievements is also highlighted as essential for building a culture of academic excellence. Ultimately, investing in the education of these children is expected to lead to a brighter future for both individuals and the state as a whole.
eligibility: The applicant must be a worker employed in a registered factory, commercial establishment, or shop in Uttar Pradesh.
The applicant worker's monthly salary (basic pay + dearness allowance) should not exceed ₹15,000/-.
The applicant's child must have passed 10th, 12th, undergraduate, or postgraduate exams.
documents_required: Attested photocopy of the online filled application form related to the scheme.
Read photocopy of bank passbook of son/daughter or worker (with IFS code of the bank).
Marksheet of High School / Intermediate / Graduation / Masters (Arts, Science, Commerce and Agriculture) (Final year in Graduation / Masters).

faqs.question: What is this scheme all about?
faqs.answer: The Government of Uttar Pradesh initiated a scheme 'Ganesh Shankar Vidyarthi Shramik Puraskar Raschi Yojana' to encourage the children towards the education.

faqs.question: How much financial benefits are provided under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scholarship amounts awarded to students based on their marks in High School/Intermediate/Graduation/Post Graduation (Arts, Science, Commerce, and Agriculture) exams: 1. 60% to 74.99% - ₹5,000/- 2. 75% or more - ₹7,500/-

faqs.question: Who can get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible students whose parents are employed in a registered factory, commercial establishment, or shop in Uttar Pradesh.

faqs.question: For which courses or classes are these scholarship awards provided?
faqs.answer: The applicant's child must have passed 10th, 12th, undergraduate, or postgraduate exams.

faqs.question: What the financial eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: The applicant worker's monthly salary (basic pay + dearness allowance) should not exceed ₹15,000/-.

faqs.question: What is procedure to get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: 1. Applicant need to do the registration. 2. Fill out the application form and apply.

faqs.question: What is official website to get register and apply?
faqs.answer: Follow the below URL. Link : https://skpuplabour.in/.

faqs.question: What documents are required?
faqs.answer: 1. Attested photocopy of the online filled application form related to the scheme. 2. Read photocopy of bank passbook of son/daughter or worker (with IFS code of the bank). 3. Marksheet of High School / Intermediate / Graduation / Masters (Arts, Science, Commerce and Agriculture) (Final year in Graduation / Masters).
